name: Spiral Rush: a Snake Game
description:
Do you like snake games? Think again what you know about them! In Spiral Rush you can turn left only... Sounds easily but tricky to play! Guide the ball in various playgrounds, avoid the walls, the obstacles and the road what you have drawn, the target is to touch the hole when it turns green! Caution! Spiral Rush can be addictive! This game is easy to play but getting harder level by level.
How long can you turn left only? Let’s try this endless fun!

KEY FEATURES
- vivid coloring
- simple and addictive - like a snake game
- guide the ball into the hole
- turn left only

TIPS
- draw a spiral to reach the hole
- avoid walls, obstacles and the road what you have drawn before
- try to make huge circles at the beginning

Please rate Spiral Rush and submit your feedback for further improvements!
